description: Try our easy to follow Citrus Tea Sunrise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tea & iced tea,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Mother's Day,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Citrus Tea Sunrise Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 orange, rind, pith removed and juiced

recipeInstructions.text: Roll pomegranate on work surface, pressing down firmly to release juice. Make a small cut in the centre of the pomegranate and pour juices into a jug, then fully cut in half. Scoop out the seeds into a bowl and, using the end of a rolling pin or a pestle, crush seeds to release juices. Strain through a sieve into the jug of juice.
Place teabags and orange rind in a heatproof jug and pour over 3 cups boiling water. Stand for 5 minutes to allow flavours to infuse. Discard orange rind and teabags.
Add pomegranate and orange juice. Stir to combine and serve immediately.
